**Chris Henson**

**Chief of Police**

903 West Yeagua Street

Groesbeck, Texas 76642

Phone: (254) 729-3497         Fax: (254) 729-8393

***Emergency: 911***

**About the Department**The Groesbeck Police Department employs 9 dedicated professionals, all sworn officers.  The department provides police services to those who live, work, visit and shop within the City of Groesbeck, 24 hours a day 7 days a week.  The Groesbeck Police department is dedicated to a standard of excellence in promoting and maintaining a safe and peaceful community.

**Department Structure**The police department is comprised of three basic sections: Administration, Investigation, and Patrol.

Groesbeck Texas - A Great Place to Live, Play, and Work
